com.nifcloud.mbaas.core

クラス NCMBScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBScript

  • public class NCMBScript
extends java.lang.Object
    NCMBScript is used to script.

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

      static class  NCMBScript.MethodType
      HTTP method types

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      NCMBScript(java.lang.String scriptName, NCMBScript.MethodType method)
      Create NCMBScript instance with specified script name and request method
      NCMBScript(java.lang.String scriptName, NCMBScript.MethodType method, java.lang.String baseUrl)
      Create NCMBScript instance with specified script name and request method
      This constructor can set the custom endpoint for debug

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • NCMBScript

        public NCMBScript(java.lang.String scriptName,
                  NCMBScript.MethodType method)
        Create NCMBScript instance with specified script name and request method
        パラメータ:
        scriptName - script name
        method - HTTP method

      • NCMBScript

        public NCMBScript(java.lang.String scriptName,
                  NCMBScript.MethodType method,
                  java.lang.String baseUrl)
        Create NCMBScript instance with specified script name and request method
        This constructor can set the custom endpoint for debug
        パラメータ:
        scriptName - script name
        method - HTTP method
        baseUrl - script base url

    • メソッドの詳細

      • setScriptName

        public void setScriptName(java.lang.String scriptName)
        set the script name
        パラメータ:
        scriptName - script name

        public java.lang.String getScriptName()
        get the script name
        戻り値:
        script name

      • setMethod

        public void setMethod(NCMBScript.MethodType method)
        set the HTTP method
        パラメータ:
        method - HTTP method type

        public NCMBScript.MethodType getMethod()
        get the HTTP method
        戻り値:
        HTTP method type

      • setBaseUrl

        public void setBaseUrl(java.lang.String baseUrl)
        set the script base url
        パラメータ:
        baseUrl - script base url

      • getBaseUrl

        public java.lang.String getBaseUrl()
        get the script base url
        戻り値:
        script base url

      • execute

        public byte[] execute(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header,
                      org.json.JSONObject body,
                      org.json.JSONObject query)
               throws NCMBException
        Execute the script with request parameters
        パラメータ:
        header - header data
        body - content data
        query - query params
        戻り値:
        Result to script
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception sdk internal or NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • executeInBackground

        public void executeInBackground(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header,
                                org.json.JSONObject body,
                                org.json.JSONObject query,
                                ExecuteScriptCallback callback)
        Execute the script asynchronously with request parameters
        パラメータ:
        header - header data
        body - content data
        query - query params
        callback - callback after execute script
